alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal; Mobile Inland; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 30 at 12:01PM CDT until March 31 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT CDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, south winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, south winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...Choctaw, Washington, Mobile Inland, Mobile Central and Mobile Coastal Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 5 PM this afternoon to 9 PM CDT this evening. For the first Wind Advisory, until 5 PM CDT this afternoon. For the second Wind Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to midnight CDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Choctaw; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal; Mobile Inland; Washington
